title: Supporting Families Year-Round
description: Every donation provides quality childcare, nutritious meals, and essential support to families in Frenchtown. Your gift today helps us continue serving our community tomorrow.

impactStats.label: Every $50
impactStats.value: Provides a week of quality childcare for one child

impactStats.label: Every $100
impactStats.value: Feeds a family of four for two weeks

impactStats.label: Every $500
impactStats.value: Supports our Thanksgiving meal program serving 20+ families

transparency: 100% of donations fund direct programs and services
